RelationshipElement.name: Burial Mound - GPS Location
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

property.name: Date
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Description of Mound or Locale
property.description: Describe the location in relation to local topography and relief (optional)
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Landuse around Mound
property.description:
Description:

Landuse around the mound. Choose the majority landuse.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

lookup.term:
{Annual_agriculture}

Annual agriculture

{Perennial_agriculture__e_g_orchard_or_vineyard_}

Perennial agriculture (e.g orchard or vineyard)

{Urban__in_a_settlement_or_surrounded_by_infrastructure_}

Urban (in a settlement or surrounded by infrastructure)

property.name: Landuse on top of Mound
property.description:
Description:

Landuse on top of mound. Choose majority.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

lookup.term:
{Urban__in_a_settlement_or_surrounded_by_infrastructure_}

Urban (in a settlement or surrounded by infrastructure)

property.name: Position in the landscape
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

lookup.term: {Upper_slope} Upper and lower slope - mentally divide the slope in half and pinpoint your position within upper or lower part.

property.name: Mound prominence
property.description: This is the team's subjective measure of how prominent the mound is within its landscape setting. It is understood that other circumstances contribute to the overall measure, such as weather/visibility, line of approach, mound height, elevation, surrounding landuse, geomorphology, and vegetation. Teams are to assess how noticeable the mound is in its current condition and how controlling the view from the mound is.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

lookup.term: {Low} Not prominent, but noticeable at 50-250m distance

{Medium}
Noticeable once in line of sight, or noticeable at 250-500m

{High}
Noticeable at a considerable distance, or visible at >500m

{Super_prominent}
Noticeable at great distance, dominant point in local landscape

property.name: Photo
property.description:
Description:

Take one generval overview shot that includes the complete feature profile and a scale. The facing direction above should articulate which direction you were facing when taking the general overview shot.

Example:
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Shape Notes
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Associated Feature or Material
property.description: Stone wall (krepis) is found either at the foot of the mound, or inside it (upon excavation). Enclosure is a fence or a circle of variable material either around or some distance outside of the mound. Standing features in the vicinity comprise other standing stone or architectural features associated with the mound. Artefact scatter indicates a discreet and bounded concentration of manmade objects on the surface of the mound or its close vicinity. Loose artefacts indicates one or two artefacts dispersed on or around mound. Bones denote bioarchaeological remains, human or animal. Other - please use the annotation to describe.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Surface Material Description
property.description: Please comment on the density, dimensions, boundedness, and other characteristics of the associated surface materials.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Sample Collected
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Chronology Estimate
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Associated Feature or Material Photo
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Condition
property.description: Condition here describes a measurable change in the state of a burial mound (as compared with some prior condition of the state). Please assess the amount of anthropogenic and natural impacts that the mound has suffered. Such impacts can be direct or indirect (caused by action but occur later in time or farther removed in space). They can be discrete or continuous, depending on whether the cause occurs only once, or recurs at intervals.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

lookup.term:
{1___pristine}
1 - pristine or only superficial damage, up to 10% of mound volume missing.

{2___minor_damage}
2- minor damage, 10-25% of mound volume missing.

{3___damaged}
3 - considerable damage, up to 50% of mound volume missing.

{4___seriously_damaged}
4 - massive amount of damage, more than 50% of mound missing.

{5___extinct_or_near_extinct}
5 - nearly nothing remains of the mound.

property.name: Principal Source of Impact
property.description: Please select the principal source of impact; identifying the cause of decline that has contributed most to either the amount of damage, its extent in 3D space or its duration. Please use the annotation to identify the causal agent of an impact. E.g. activities such as plowing, road construction, timber harvest can be potential impact agents, and can precipitate -cause other impacts, such as erosion through the removal of trees, or alteration by compaction of sediment, etc. The principal impacts are Anthropogenic (manmade), Animal activity, or Natural (erosion, compaction, ...etc), and Other. Please describe Other in an annotation.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Other Sources of Impact
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Archaeological potential
property.description: Archaeological potential is result of site formation and developmental history of a site both of which affect what is archaeologically knowable (Wildesen 1984, Schiffer 1976), a subjective judgment of the physical status of as mound in relation to the preservation of information on its use for future archaeological study.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

lookup.term:
{1___full}
1 - mound appears close to original condition and is likely to retain its full archaeological potential.

{2___good}
2 - mound is slightly damaged and some archaeological potential is impaired, but lots remains.

{3___impaired}
3 - archaeological potential of this mound is significantly compromised

{4___minimal}
4 - archaeological potential of the mound is low or severly compromised

{5__none_or_nearly_none}
5 - no or nearly no archaeological potential is left

property.name: Most recent damage what
property.description: Select the most recent source of damage. Use annotation if damage type not listed.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Most recent damage within
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: RT Description
property.description: Describe Robber's trenches - if present - in the following format separating trenches by semicolons and parameters by commas:[TrenchNumber,shape,dimensionx,dimensiony,depth,note;TrenchNumber,shape,radius,depth,note]. Example: [01,round,1.5m,0.5m,manually excavated hole;02,rectangle,0.5,2.5,0.3,neatly excavated shallow trench]
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Comments and Recommendations
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: CRM Photos
property.description: Take a picture of each robber's trench with a scale.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.formatString: GPS-$2
